entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
